casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gregory Charles BASKINS 273P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 27, 2018 Laura Altman, Reid Cater, Attorney at Laws, for Baskins, Gregory Charles. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State.

Mr. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N.C. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, P.O. Box 629, Raleigh, NC 27602

*587The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of August 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of August 2018."
